channel.title: Help with veng again! >_<
channel.description:
Hello, I need help. The veng I got now makes Silab users get dc..
Could someone post a veng ''code'' that I can paste into client.java that's working both for silab, mopar and clients? pl0x.
Thanks ~ Extoz. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 03:20:34 pm[/size][hr]Omfg, please! Someone, tell me! ;S

if(playerIsMember == 1)

At the beginning of the code.

item.title: Help with veng again! >_<
item.dc:creator: @oneshell oneshell
item.description:
@oneshell wrote:

this is what i have

case 162://vengence { if(playerIsMember == 1) if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(401, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1914); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); txt4 = "I AM FUCKIN SWEET BITCH, EAT VENGANCE"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You need to be a member to cast vengeance!"); break;

seems to work for silabs and clients.

Read full topic
